title: Missing Free Promos Win
body: I'm currently in plat promos for the 2nd time, and after playing one game (and losing) I realized that I didn't get the free win, not really sure what to do about this. Not sure how to prove this either.

replies.body:
you only get the free win up to gold 1.

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/2016-season-update/ranked-improvements.html

> TL;DR: When you're in a division lower than Gold 1, if you lose a promotional series, the next time you enter your series, you'll start with at least one win.
Ah ok, makes sense, sorry for the misunderstanding.
